    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
      RaceType race,
      java.awt.Color color,
      Difficulty difficulty)
        Create a Player object using a name, a RaceType, a Color, and Difficulty. The Player will have its inventory set to the proper initial amounts, which depend on both RaceType and Difficulty.
        Parameters:
        name - The player's name
        race - The player's race
        color - The player's color for marking land plots
        difficulty - The game's set difficulty

    • Method Detail

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore()
        Calculates and returns the Player's current score.
        Returns:
        The Player's current score

      • buyMuleFromSeller

        public void buyMuleFromSeller(Trader seller,
                     Resource muleConfig,
                     int price)
                       throws FailedTransactionException
        Description copied from class: Trader
        Carries out a mule sale transaction between this Trader (the buyer) and another Trader (the seller).
        Specified by:
        buyMuleFromSeller in class Trader
        Parameters:
        seller - The Trader selling the mule
        muleConfig - The ResourceType that the mule has been configured to produce
        price - The amount that the mule is being purchased for
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown if the buyer does not have enough money to pay for the mule, or if the seller has no mules to sell

      • buyLandFromSeller

        public void buyLandFromSeller(Trader seller,
                     int price)
                       throws FailedTransactionException
        Description copied from class: Trader
        Carries out the transaction when a Trader purchases a LandPlot. LandPlot sales can occur during Land Auctions or during Development by visiting the Land Office.
        Specified by:
        buyLandFromSeller in class Trader
        Parameters:
        seller - The Trader who is selling the land
        price - The amount this Trader (the buyer) must pay
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown if the buyer cannot afford the price

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String containing information for the Player's instance data, as well as information concerning its inventory. Intended to be printed to the console for testing.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The Player's information
